name: Jellio
description:
This plugin provides integration between Jellyfin and the Jellio service.
Community-maintained fork with Jellyfin 10.11.x support.

versions.changelog:
Fixes

    Fixed streaming authentication for Jellyfin 10.11.5 (added api_key parameter to stream URLs)
    Fixed 401 errors on server-info endpoint (improved token validation)
    Fixed audio playback for DTS-HD MA 5.1 files (added audio transcoding parameters)
    Fixed missing authToken parameter in GetStreamImdbTv method

New Features

    Added logs viewer on settings page with real-time monitoring, auto-refresh, and color-coded log levels
    Added settings persistence — library selections and all form inputs are saved to Jellyfin server and restored on page load

Improvements

    Improved device token lookup to support both device and session tokens
    Enhanced logging throughout the codebase for better debugging

All changes maintain backward compatibility with existing configurations.

Fix audio playback: Remove static=true to allow audio transcoding for Stremio

Jellyfin now transcodes unsupported audio codecs (e.g., DTS-HD MA 5.1) to formats 
compatible with Stremio, fixing silent playback issues.
Fix streaming authentication for Jellyfin 10.11.5 - Add api_key parameter to stream URLs
For this release, I updated multiple simple GUI things and added some extra polish. Enjoy!

# Jellio v1.1.0 - Jellyseerr Integration

## What's New

Added Jellyseerr integration! When a stream is unavailable in Stremio, you'll now see a **"📥 Request via Jellyseerr"** option. Click it to automatically request the movie or TV show in Jellyseerr.

## Configuration

To enable this feature:
1. Open the Jellio plugin configuration page
2. Enable "Jellyseerr Integration"
3. Enter your Jellyseerr URL (use internal Docker address for Docker setups, e.g., `http://192.168.0.125:5055`)
4. Enter your Jellyseerr API Key (found in Jellyseerr Settings > General > API Key)
5. Click "Save Configuration to Jellyfin"

## Installation

Download `jellio_1.1.0.0.zip` and upload it via Jellyfin Admin Dashboard > Plugins > Upload Plugin. Restart Jellyfin after installation.
Jellio v1.0.0 - Official Release. First stable release with Jellyfin 10.11.x + .NET 9 support, robust authentication, multi-library selection, web configuration UI, and direct streaming to Stremio.
